title: gOvinda rAma
sahitya:
gOvinda rAma gOvinda gOvinda gOvinda dEvakInandana dEva vicAriso


caraNam 1    nindire neLalilla hiDiyalu kombilla tande karuNAkarane vicAriso
    caraNam 2    satta muttidu kali kAlada kattaleyetta sEruva paramjyOti vicAriso
    caraNam 3    etta nODida ratta bhASaNDabhUyiSTha uttamOttama nArAyaNa vicAriso
    caraNam 4    nInE samarthavanu nAnu jaDAtmanu kAyade koluvare jIya vicAriso
    caraNam 5    sura nararigella nInE gatiyendu purandara viTTalarAya vicAriso
